Package xxl.core.collections.queues.io

The package xxl.core.collections.queues.io provides some implementations of the queue datastructure using special containers (BlockBasedQueue), files (FileStackQueue) or streams (StreamQueue) for storing and receiving the data.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockBasedQueue
    This class provides a queue that uses a container for storing blocks of serialized data.
    CounterRandomAccessFileQueue
    This class provides a decorator for a random access file queue that counts the number of bytes that are read from and written to the underlying queue.
    FileStackQueue
    This class provides an implementation of the Queue interface with a LIFO (last in, first out) strategy that internally uses a file for storing its elements.
    ListStreamQueue
    This class provides a stream queue that stores the bytes of its serialized elements in a ListQueue.
    QueueBuffer<E>
    This class implements a queue interface.
    QueueBuffer.PageConverter<E>
    Page converter for a internal page representation; see ConverterContainer.
    QueueBuffer.SimplePage<E>
    Internal bucket/page.
    RandomAccessFileQueue<E>
    This class provides a stream queue that stores the bytes of its serialized elements in a random access file.
    StreamQueue<E>
    This class provides a queue that uses a data input stream and a data output stream to store its elements.

Package xxl.core.collections.queues.io Description

The package xxl.core.collections.queues.io provides some implementations of the queue datastructure using special containers (BlockBasedQueue), files (FileStackQueue) or streams (StreamQueue) for storing and receiving the data.
